title: Cancel Incoming Streams Based on Type
description: Immediately cancel the real-time streams of messages of given type

forget_all.description: Cancel all streams of a given type (which should be 'ticks', 'proposal', 'proposal_open_contract', etc)

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
